<a id="RemoteTransform2D"></a>

# RemoteTransform2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

RemoteTransform2D pushes its own [Transform2D](Transform2D.md) to another [Node2D](Node2D.md) derived node in the scene.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

RemoteTransform2D pushes its own [Transform2D](Transform2D.md) to another [Node2D](Node2D.md) derived node (called the remote node) in the scene.

It can be set to update another node's position, rotation and/or scale. It can use either global or local coordinates.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="RemoteTransform2D_property_remote_path"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **remote_path** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#RemoteTransform2D_property_remote_path)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_remote_node**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_remote_node**\ (\ )

The [NodePath](NodePath.md) to the remote node, relative to the RemoteTransform2D's position in the scene.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RemoteTransform2D_property_update_position"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **update_position** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#RemoteTransform2D_property_update_position)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_update_position**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_update_position**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the remote node's position is updated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RemoteTransform2D_property_update_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_update_rotation**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_update_rotation**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the remote node's rotation is updated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RemoteTransform2D_property_update_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **update_scale** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#RemoteTransform2D_property_update_scale)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_update_scale**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_update_scale**\ (\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RemoteTransform2D_property_use_global_coordinates"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **use_global_coordinates** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#RemoteTransform2D_property_use_global_coordinates)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_global_coordinates**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_use_global_coordinates**\ (\ )

If ``true``, global coordinates are used. If ``false``, local coordinates are used.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="RemoteTransform2D_method_force_update_cache"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **force_update_cache**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#RemoteTransform2D_method_force_update_cache)

**RemoteTransform2D** caches the remote node. It may not notice if the remote node disappears; [force_update_cache()](RemoteTransform2D.md#RemoteTransform2D_method_force_update_cache) forces it to update the cache again.
